actions.description: The deathlock makes two Deathly Claw or Grave Bolt attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3 necrotic damage).
actions.name: Deathly Claw

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d8) necrotic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or become restrained as shadowy tendrils wrap around it for 1 minute. A restrained target can use its action to repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Grave Bolt

actions.description:
The deathlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: detect magic, disguise self, mage armor, minor illusion

1/day each: darkness, dimension door, dispel magic, fly, invisibility
actions.name: Spellcasting

languages: the languages it knew in life
name: Deathlock Mastermind [MoM]
resistances: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

specialTraits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the deathlock's darkvision.
specialTraits.name: Devil's Sight

specialTraits.description: The deathlock has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.
specialTraits.name: Turn Resistance

specialTraits.description: The deathlock doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
